channel.title: TorvaPkz Accept Button Glitch
channel.description: hey so im trying to set up my server with torvapkz. but when i try to trade someone an item i cant accept the trade. i can add items and decline just not accept. im willing to reward you if you can help me. i prefer tv but i may be able to make acceptions. thank you so much!
